column5: Look no further! Your perfect stay in houston is a click away. Modern one bedroom apartment, brand NEW complex, clean, quiet, and let's talk about LOCATION (minutes from the galleria and easy access to the highway). You will not be disappointed. TV in the living room, comfortable mattress, WIFI, washer and dryer in the unit.
